heading: Get pricing for POS and CC processing packages
description: To ensure we provide the most effective payment processing, point of sale solutions & cash signing bonus for your business, we require some initial information from you.

finish.desc: We have all the information we need to prepare an offer for you. Our team will be in touch within 24 hours.
finish.any_question: If you have any urgent questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

looking_for: What are you <br className='only-sp' /> looking for?
card_payment_fee: Are you currently passing your card payments fees to the customer? (cash discount program)
follow_up_contact: We need your contact to follow up

third.label: We need your contact <br className='hide-pc' /> to follow up

confirm_heading: Great! We've received <br className='only-sp' /> your initial information.
confirm_desc: To speed up the process and receive a direct quote, you can either complete the next part (only 6 questions) or schedule a call with us at your convenience.
question_for_stations: How many stations are you looking for?
processing_volume: What is your monthly credit card processing volume?
cash_discount: Are you currently on cash discount?
cash_discount_desc: Also known as Zero processing, or passing off the fees to the customer. A cash discount is when you post credit card prices and offer a discount on that price for customers who pay with cash.
cash_discount_questions: No, but I'm willing to go on it
location_question: How many locations do you have?
sale_system_question: What point-of-sale system are you currently using?
station_question: How many stations do you currently have?
